author: Fextralife
description:
Monster Hunter Wilds Review - The BEST Monster Hunter YET?? (PC & PS5)
In this Monster Hunter Wilds Review, we’ll take an in-depth look at Capcom’s latest release of their flagship Action-RPG and answer whether it’s worth your time and money. If you were a fan of Monster Hunter World or MHRise, and want to know how Wilds stacks up, or if you’re a new player to the series and want to know if this game is for you: read on to find out.

Timestamp
0:00 - Monster Hunter Wilds Review
0:18 - Story and Setting
1:50 - Gameplay
12:20 - Replayability & Multiplayer
13:36 - Audio, Visual & Design
15:18 - Final thought
16:07 - Review Score
